homepage.tagline: Every Match Counts — Every Player Matters
homepage.prime_description_2: Born from the heart of the grassroots scene, Prime is not just a league — it's a living system designed to reward dedication, amplify visibility, and connect ambitious players through real, meaningful competition.
homepage.prime_description_3: In Prime you don't just play — you grind.
homepage.prime_description_4: Every match is a step forward. Every queue is a shot at growth. Every match builds your story. Whether you're playing solo or as part of a squad, PRIME creates the space for authentic connection and continuous competition.
homepage.prime_description_5: This is where grassroots players rise to their prime!

faq.q1: Is there a prize for competing in PRIME?
faq.a1: Yes! PRIME features a total prize pool of 800,000 SAR, making every match count.
faq.q2: How many matches can I play in a day?
faq.a2:
There is no daily limit! You can play as many matches as you like during the allowed play times:

All Days: from 4:00 PM to 4:00 AM.
faq.q3: Can I participate in multiple games at the same time?
faq.a3: Yes! You can compete across all 11 supported games. However, you can only search for one match at a time.
faq.q4: How do I contact my team after we’re matched?
faq.a4: Each match page includes an in-game team chat, plus you can connect on the official PRIME Discord server to coordinate faster.
faq.q5: How are match score disputes handled?
faq.a5: At the end of each match, team captains must submit the final score. If results don’t match, PRIME support team will review the evidence and confirm the correct score.
faq.q6: What happens if I have to suddenly leave during a match?
faq.a6: Once a match is found, you’re expected to play and finish it. If you leave, the match continues without you, and you may receive a warning or penalty according to league rules.
faq.q7: What should I do if a teammate is toxic or refuses to cooperate?
faq.a7: After each match, you can rate your teammates with a like or dislike on their player card. You can also report any serious misconduct directly through our Discord support system.

games.disc_3: Let the system work its magic and shape your squad
games.disc_4: Win, level up, and climb the leaderboard match by match
